731136f-a.title: Celebrations - Parades - Municipal Events - Beer Parade.
731136f-a.text:
Celebrations, arades ard Municipal Events:
TEw ''Beer for Taxation'' parade moving westward on Central
Park South (W. 59th Street) in one of the greatest deron-
strations in the City's history, demanding that beer be
legalized as an aid to relieve the Dep-ssion. Over 100,000
New Yorkers participated in the Parade led by Mayor James
J. Walker.
Mav 14, 1932
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
731136f-a.folder: Central Park South and West 59th Street, Manhattan, N.Y.
